constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 102 (Wednesday, June 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Tennessee:
H.R. 8078.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the Constitution of
the United States of America.
[Page H5611]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Reducing Medically Unnecessary Delays in Care Act of 2022
